data.comment: The big names in today's match at Regenboogstadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started, with Antwerp kicking-off.
In the minute 7, Goal! Jean-Luc Dompe gives Zulte a 1-0 lead.
Lothar D'Hondt blows to end the first-half.
It's Zulte with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 57, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Faris Haroun.
The away team replace Simen Juklerod with Nana Opoku Ampomah.
Goal! Martin Hongla gives Antwerp a 1-2 lead in Waregem.
In the minute 64, The home team have replaced Jelle Vossen with Abdoulaye Sissako. This is the first substitution made today by Francky Dury.
Bassem Srarfi is replacing Jean-Luc Dompe for Zulte at Regenboogstadion.
Lior Refaelov (Antwerp) has received a yellow card from Lothar D'Hondt.
In the minute 74, Ibrahima Seck (Zulte) gets a yellow card.
Jannes Van Hecke is on a sub for Damien Marcq for Zulte.
Antwerp make their second substitution with Cristian Benavente replacing Lior Refaelov.
In the minute 88, Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a third substitution, with Nill De Pauw replacing Koji Miyoshi.
That's full-time at Regenboogstadion. The final score is 1-3.
Great finish from Cristian Benavente to give Antwerp a 1-3 lead.
